Question: HDMI Licensing Administrator, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HDMI Licensing Administrator, Inc.

HDMI 2.1b Specification
 - Supports 8K60 and 4K120 video resolutions
 - Capable of resolutions up to 10K
 - Increased bandwidth up to 48Gbps
 - Dynamic HDR format support

HDMI 1.4b Specification
 - Supports 4K resolution and 1080p@120Hz
 - HDMI Ethernet Channel
 - Audio Return Channel (ARC)

HDMI ALT Mode for USB Type-C
 - Direct connection of source devices to HDMI-enabled displays without adapters

Additional Services
 - Licensing and marketing of HDMI technology
 - Counterfeit prevention through HDMI Authenticate Report service
